Class LootFactory

java.lang.Object
items.LootFactory
public final class LootFactory extends Object
Provides predefined loot tables for different difficulty levels in the U-Energy RPG game.

The LootFactory class defines static lists of item-generating functions, categorized by difficulty: Easy, Medium, and Hard.

Each loot entry is a Function that takes a Monster as input and returns an Item, allowing dynamic assignment of item ownership.

  • Field Details

    • EASY_LOOT

      public static final List<Function<characters.Monster, Item>> EASY_LOOT
      Loot table for Easy difficulty.

      Includes rusted versions of Sword, Gauntlet, and Pistol.

    • MEDIUM_LOOT

      public static final List<Function<characters.Monster, Item>> MEDIUM_LOOT
      Loot table for Medium difficulty.

      Includes fine versions of Sword, Gauntlet, and Pistol.

    • HARD_LOOT

      public static final List<Function<characters.Monster, Item>> HARD_LOOT
      Loot table for Hard difficulty.

      Includes shiny versions of Sword, Gauntlet, and Pistol.
